operations with task collections
[scattered data-points for interpolation (task)]


Functions

bool surfit::tasks_load (const char *filename, const char *taskname=NULL)
 reads task from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_tasks
bool surfit::tasks_read (const char *filename, const char *taskname=NULL, int columns=3, int col1=1, int col2=2, int col3=3, const char *delimiter=" ", int grow_by=250)
 reads task from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_tasks
bool surfit::tasks_delall ()
 removes all elements from surfit_tasks
bool surfit::tasks_del (int pos=-1)
 removes task from surfit_tasks at positioin 'pos'
bool surfit::task_concat (task *tsk)
 adds scattered data-points from 'tsk' to surfit_task
task * surfit::tasks_at (int pos)
 returns task at position 'pos' in surfit_tasks
task * surfit::tasks_first ()
 returns first task in surfit_tasks
task * surfit::tasks_last ()
 returns last task in surfit_tasks
int surfit::tasks_size ()
 returns amount of elements in surfit_tasks
int surfit::tasks_info ()
 prints info about all tasks in surfit_tasks

Function Documentation

const char *  taskname = NULL,
int  columns = 3,
int  col1 = 1,
int  col2 = 2,
int  col3 = 3,
const char *  delimiter = " ",
int  grow_by = 250
) 
 

Parameters:
filename filename with formatted text data
taskname name
columns amount of columns
col1 First column position
col2 Second column position
col3 Third column position
grow_by vector growth
delimiter delimiter (" " or "," or "\t", ...)
